text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse The American president’s incompetence, ignorance and dishonesty in handling this crisis has been stunning,” wrote Redlener. “One hundred and twenty-seven thousand Americans are dead already, and that number will continue to rise.” #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath https://t.co/aPVMQC8DDH
